c74object.name: hoa.thisprocess~
c74object.digest: Control hoa.process~ voice allocation, muting, argument and attributes.
c74object.description: Use the hoa.thisprocess~ object to control hoa.process~ voice allocation, muting, argument and attributes. When placed inside a patcher loaded by a hoa.process~ object, it send and receive messages from the hoa.process~ object that loads it.

metadatalist.metadata: Julien Colafrancesco, Pierre Guillot, Eliott Paris.

method.name: bang
method.digest: Report the instance informations in a right to left outputting order.
method.description:
Output instance informations in a right to left outputting order.
mute state (0/1).
patcher attributes.
patcher arguments.
process context and mode. ex : "2d harmonics".
process instance informations depending on the current mode.
In planewaves mode (2d/3d). It will be (number-of-channels, instance-channel)
In 2d harmonics mode, it will be a list with (ambisonic-order, harmonic-index)
In 3d harmonics mode, it will be a list with (ambisonic-order, harmonic-band, harmonic-index)

method.name: mute
method.digest: Disable DSP processing for this patcher instance.
method.description: Turns off signal processing for this specific instance. Argument is the mute state, 0 means unmuted, others value means muted
